We gifted Shadowheart a Night Orchid - her favourite flower. She was greatly appreciative of the gesture. Shadowheart confessed to us that she is experiencing a crisis of faith. She feels like aspects of her own character are at odds with the tenets of her Shar worship, and she is having difficulty in reconciling the two.
